items.title: Aivicall
items.description: It is an AI-driven video conferencing web application built with Node.js, React, WebRTC, WebSockets, and Express. It features JWT-based authentication, real-time peer-to-peer communication, and AI-enhanced collaboration, increasing user engagement by 40%.

items.title: E-commerce Dashboard
items.description: Ecommerce is a full-stack MERN application utilizing React, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, and Google OAuth 2.0. It implements RESTful APIs, secure authentication, role-based access control (RBAC), and an optimized NoSQL schema for high scalability.

items.title: Sponxer Home
items.description: A frontend application build to serve as lending and data collection page for a startup.

items.title: AI Pdf Analyzer
items.description: AiPDF_Analyzer is a FastAPI-based document processing tool using Langchain, FAISS, PostgreSQL, and HuggingFace Transformers. It enables vector-based semantic search, embeddings-based retrieval, and asynchronous API handling, improving large file query speed by 15%.

items.title: Medlas
items.description: AI Assitant to help out doctors and patients know themselves better.

items.title: AutoCret
items.description: AutoCret is a Python-based automation package leveraging Selenium, MoviePy, REST APIs, and multithreading to dynamically generate and curate multimedia content. It enables automated web scraping, data extraction, and content transformation, improving workflow efficiency.

items.title: E-cell Website
items.description: E-cell Website is a high-performance Next.js application for DTUâ€™s entrepreneurship cell. It implements SSR (Server-Side Rendering), ISR (Incremental Static Regeneration), optimized caching, and handles 4,000+ peak concurrent users efficiently.
